entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023
